(\{ (\{ 4, 2 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Level 1: fishing rod, hoop-and-stick, peg, sudare, tool handle\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 2: cup-and-ball, figurine, hilt, inkwell, mask\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 3: bead, cane, comb, plate, swordblade\

\\r\\nLevel 4: arm splint, backscratcher, crate, leg splint, spoon, tail splint\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 5: boards, bowl, haft, hairbrush, staff, truncheon\
\\r\\nFIGURINES: cow, dragon, goat\
\\r\\n\

\\r\\nLevel 7: button, chamber pot, club, coatstand, crutches, easel, paneling, (from crate) medium crate, (from stool) half-finished stool\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 8: bench, lumber box, paint palette, stool, (from rack) weapon rack, (from table) nightstand\
\\r\\nFIGURINES: ape, badger, bear, rabbig, tailor\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 9: bookshelf, chair, painter kit, shutters, (from crate) large crate, (from hairsticks) paddle hairsticks, (from table) writing table\
\\r\\nFIGURINES: otter, rodent, weasel\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 10: cabinet, bucket, cradle, (from chair) caquetoire chair, (from hairsticks) serpent hairsticks, (from rack) hat rack, (from table) desk\
\\r\\nFIGURINES: comhach, ferret, monkey\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 11: coffin, crib, hat block, pattens, (from bench) settle, (from chair) watchman\

\\r\\n\

\\r\\n\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 14: dagger sheath, hand-fan, jewelry box, pestle, (from rack) clothing rack, (from chair) curule, tea caddy\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 15: bangle, folding screen, trunk, (from shield) buckler, (from chest) traveller, cigar box\
\\r\\nFIGURINES: lutara, shark\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLevel 16: basin, dress form, dresser, mannequin, pitcher, (from rack) armor rack\

\\r\\nFIGURINES: leprechaun, polar bear, ram\

" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 2 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "The Sacred Tree was created to provide the city with an independent reliable and quick carpentry and wood-crafting services. We also welcome students new to carpentry or simply seeking to improve their own skills. \\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nWe are actively seeking new members! Any interested parties should contact \Ms. Irene\ via missive or in person.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nPlease join me in welcoming the newest member of the Sacred Tree, \Ms. Polgara\!" \}), (\{ "page", "Items Available", "prices" \}) \})
(\{ (\{ 4, 4 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Nothing has been added to this page yet." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
